plot: A modern day Casanova manages his affairs as if they were sales deals, with tragic consequences when he becomes the key suspect in a serial murder investigation. A Hitchcockesk urban thriller.
title: The Libertines
plot_es: A modern day Casanova manages his affairs as if they were sales deals, with tragic consequences when he becomes the key suspect in a serial murder investigation. A Hitchcockesk urban thriller.
plot_en: A modern day Casanova manages his affairs as if they were sales deals, with tragic consequences when he becomes the key suspect in a serial murder investigation. A Hitchcockesk urban thriller.
